text: There are no regrets in life, just lessons.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: The greater your capacity to love, the greater your capacity to feel the pain.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: I think it's important to have closure in any relationship that ends from a romantic relationship to a friendship. You should always have a sense of clarity at the end and know why it began and why it ended. You need that in your life to move cleanly into your next phase.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: It gets so boring you know just to do the same thing over and over again.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: Really try to follow what it is that you want to do and what your heart is telling you to do.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: People who avoid the brick walls - all power to ya, but we all have to hit them sometimes in order to push through to the next level, to evolve.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: The best smell in the world is that man that you love.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: I love that feeling of being in love,the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: True love brings up everything you're allowing a mirror to be held up to you daily.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: I enjoy smoking cannabis and see no harm in it.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: I guess we'd be living in a boring, perfect world if everybody wished everybody else well.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: You know everything about the other. You are comfortable. There are no secrets.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: You know when I feel inwardly beautiful? When I am with my girlfriends and we are having a goddess circle.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: I think there comes a point where you have to grow up and get over yourself, lighten upâ€¦and forgive.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: Relationships are two people; everyone is accountable. A lot goes into a relationship coming together, and a lot goes into a relationship falling apart. Even if it's 98 percent the other person's fault, it's 2 percent yours You can only clean up your side of the street.
author: Jennifer Aniston
